'''Pyro Treasure Compass''' is a [[Treasure Compass|treasure compass]] [[gadget]] that can be used to search for nearby [[chests]] in [[Natlan]]. It can be created through [[forging]] after using the [[Diagram: Pyro Treasure Compass|diagram]] obtained by reaching [[Tribe Reputation]] Level 4 with 3 tribes in Natlan.

{{Transclude|Treasure Compass|compass intro|section=1}}
